name: Intelygenz
tagline: If you have a dream, we can write the code
description:
Intelygenz was founded in 2002 and has maintained its commitment to quality software development for over 10 years, helping our customers optimize their efficiency. Our company offers specialized services in multiple areas, while staying true to our company values. We are developers who make customized software.
We act as strategic partners for the innovation and R & D departments of multinationals located in the UK and US.
